greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Signature permutation of a Catalan bijection: row 3747 of A089840.
comment: This bijection of binary trees can be obtained by applying bijection *A074680 to the right hand side subtree and leaving the left hand side subtree intact. See also comments at A154121.
or (a . (() . c)) -> (a . (c . ())) if the former is not possible.
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2055
Index entries for signature-permutations of Catalan automorphisms
program: (Destructive version of this automorphism in Scheme:) (define (*A154122! s) (if (pair? s) (*A074680! (cdr s))) s)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 06 2009
